basics.name: QA ENGINEERING TEAM LEAD
basics.label: Quality Assurance Engineering
basics.summary: Eight years of progressive technical experience in quality assurance engineering of computer software in windows environment.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Primary responsibility for the quality of the company's Imagicast product line. Lead the QA team assigned to the Imagicast related quality tasks. Involved in the diagnosis of product failures or performance problems reported from the field.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Primarily responsible for performing analysis of existing job flows, coordination and update of systems documentation, and providing proposals for change.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: QA Lead for Customer Care/Service Applications
work.summary: Primarily responsible for performing analysis of existing job flows, coordination and update of systems documentation, and providing proposals for change while assisting with test execution.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Led a QA team in black box and white box testing of a distributed architecture system with client and server components.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for developing low-level QA Test Plan and QA Reference Documentation and QA Findings Document for the Pilot project. Assisted in the development of new testing methods and procedures.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Tested Client/Server Application - database application developed for non-profit organization. Created and executed cases for regression testing.
